name: Water Fight!
description:
Water Fight is an action rpg like no other; explore a massive world filled with imagination, quirky monsters and action packed fun!

In WaterFight you control a team of kids armed to teeth with water guns, mops, water balloons. Your kids must travel through backyards filled with vile, treacherous monsters. Earn money, get awesome weapons, unlock new powerful skills, defeat hordes of unique monsters and bosses!

Install now for free!
